body:
hi mostapha

I was doing analysis on a building and wondering if we can apply a material in LB to a surface on which i am doing analysis, I guess we can see a difference in radiation analysis if there is a way to apply a material!

Thank you!

replies.body:
Hi Kartik,

Sorry that I didn't get back to you sooner. Ladybug calculates the incident radiation and it doesn't calculate the reflections from the other surfaces. Your point is right and you will be able to set up the surface materials in Honeybee.

Mostapha

hi mostapha,

thanks! when we can expect the launch of Honeybee??
Hi Kartik, Very very soon. Finishing the last modifications. -Mostapha
